result.title: Report on identification of critical issues for sustainability
result.description: This report will build on input from WP2-7, and provide a prioritised list and in-depth analysis of critical issues for EPOS sustainability. The report will address the whole of the EPOS delivery framework and data provision. Urgent actions to carry out will be identified and reported to the EPOS ERIC Executive Board.
